action.name: Copy Image to Clipboard
action.command: sh -c 'case "%f" in *.jpg|*.JPG|*.jpeg|*.JPEG) xclip -selection clipboard -t image/jpeg -i < "%f" ;; *.png|*.PNG) xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png -i < "%f" ;; esac'
action.description: Copy image data to clipboard for pasting in applications
